title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Park Planning Archives
body: Park Planning Archives       On this page you will find archives of planning documents of reports. These documents are provided for reference only. Depending on the age of the document, some of the information contained within may now be out of date.                 Park Facility Plan In July 2007, discussions between Keweenaw National Historical Park and the National Park Service, Midwest Regional Office’s Office of Planning, Communications, and Legislation led to a facility planning process in which the Park staff would develop an implementation approach to the broad facility prescriptions identified in the Park’s 1998 General Management Plan. The product of this process would be reviewed by the Office of Planning to determine whether the approach complied with NEPA and NHPA requirements. This report is that product: a planning supplement for the development of park facilities.           Strategic Plan for Keweenaw National Historical Park FY2005-2008           Superintendent's Annual Report FY 2005
